verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Rejoice in the Lord always
and again I say Rejoice
and again I say, and again I say..
Rejoice...

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come bless the Lord
Come bless the Lord
Draw near to worship Christ the Lord
and bless his name
his holy name
declare that he is good

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
oh that men would praise him
oh that men would praise his name..
